name: Bondi Beach
address: Queen Elizabeth Dr, Bondi Beach NSW 2026
description: Sydney’s most famous beach, known for its surf, coastal walks, and vibrant cafes.

name: Sydney Opera House
description: A UNESCO World Heritage site and the heart of Sydney’s performing arts scene.

name: Royal Botanic Garden
description: A peaceful green space offering stunning harbour views and native flora displays.

name: Taronga Zoo
description: Home to over 4,000 animals with breathtaking views of Sydney Harbour.

name: The Rocks
description: Sydney’s oldest neighbourhood with cobblestone streets, markets, and pubs.

name: Darling Harbour
description: A lively waterfront precinct with restaurants, museums, and entertainment venues.

name: Blue Mountains
description: A natural wonderland of cliffs, waterfalls, and eucalyptus forests, just two hours from Sydney.

name: Barangaroo Reserve
description: An urban park celebrating Aboriginal culture, sustainability, and stunning harbour views.
